00109 inline void CInteractiveShapeBase::BeginDrag(const i2d::CVector2d& position)
00110 {
00111        const i2d::CAffine2d& invert = GetLogToViewTransform().GetInverted();
00112 
00113        BeginLogDrag(invert.GetApply(position));
00114 }

00121        SetLogDragPosition(invert.GetApply(position));
00122 }

00132 inline int CInteractiveShapeBase::GetKeysState() const
00133 {
00134        ISelectable* selectablePtr = dynamic_cast<ISelectable*>(GetDisplayPtr());
00135        if (selectablePtr != NULL){
00136               return selectablePtr->GetKeysState();
00137        }
00138        else{
00139               return 0;
00140        }
00141 }

00145 inline int CInteractiveShapeBase::GetEditMode() const
00146 {
00147        ISelectable* selectablePtr = dynamic_cast<ISelectable*>(GetDisplayPtr());
00148        if (selectablePtr != NULL){
00149               return selectablePtr->GetEditMode();
00150        }
00151        else{
00152               return ISelectable::EM_NONE;
00153        }
00154 }
